title: 1984 to 1986 secret sale of arms to Iran - goal

content.question: From 1984 to 1986, Reagan administration officials secretly sold arms to Iran to illegally finance

choices.label: a rebellion against the Sandinista government in Nicaragua
a coup against the Castro regime in Cuba
Great Britainâ€™s pursuit of the Falkland Islands War
a leftist revolt in El Salvador

content.answer: a rebellion against the Sandinista government in Nicaragua
